00124     /* This is the method that does all of the work, all of the public methods just
00125      * delegate to this one.
00126      * \todo Look into adding support for file, line, and class. I believe all of these
00127      *       will require additional shit being passed to this function (though I could
00128      *       also do it through macro magic and additional function calls... hmm...).
00129      *       I could just pass in the additional information using the varargs...
00130      * \param logLevel The level at which to output the sent info. This will be culled
00131      *        based on the software cap.
00132      * \param format The format of the string to print.
00133      * \param ... The variables to print. */
